resources.string:
Welcome to the B&Q help page.


On this page you can find information about the app, and answers to Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ).

 General Information


B&Q is an app for students, by students.
 The app facilitates the selling of old books, and offers a place where you can ask study-related questions.
 To see the books people are selling, go to the home page and tap on a study. In the pop-up, select "Books".
 To see the questions people are asking, go to the home page and tap on a study. This time, select "Questions" in the pop-up.

 FAQ


How do I pay for a book?
 You have to discuss payment methods with the seller.

 Who answers my questions? Can I trust them?
 Your questions are answered by other users of the app. Our users are mostly comprised of fellow students.

 How can I report abuse?
 You can report users from their profile page. Reports are handled by administrators.
